name: mechanics-shop-management
description: Comprehensive web-based auto repair shop management system

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:integration
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend:fix && npm run lint:frontend:fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf backend/node_modules && rm -rf frontend/node_modules
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd backend && npm audit && cd ../frontend && npm audit
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix && cd backend && npm audit fix && cd ../frontend && npm audit fix

hooks.pre-push: npm run test && npm run type-check
